column2: all <- transform (all, Observations = pmax(Decolonization_observations, Decolonization_observations.1, SPFC.Decolonize.Appearence, na.rm=TRUE))
all <- transform (all, Impacts = pmax(SPFC.Decolonize.Impact, Decolonization_impacts, Decolonization_impacts.1, na.rm=TRUE))
all <- transform (all, Recommendations = pmax(Decolonization_input, Decolonization_input.1, SPFC.Decolonize.Ideas, na.rm=TRUE))
